data.author: Andr√©s Cabral

changelog.release_notes: Fixed a bug that prevented the previously set temperature display (Kelvin or Fahrenheit) from being restored unless the user clicked save in the config window.

Added some new features! "o'" "oh" and "aught" are now options for displaying single time! Kelvin has been added for fans of seeing temperature expressed in Kelvin units! Changed the options for time refresh to standard values! More exclamations!
Fixed a bug involving showing the sun for "day" and the moon for "night".
Phew! Finally got a bug fixed involving restoring previously set configurations. Also finally got around to implementing the other settings that previously did nothing. Nearly there, folks!
Made some updates to the configuration options and squashed more bugs. More to come!
Added "Noon" and "Midnight". Tweaked some settings and fixed bugs pertaining to configuring the watchface features.
First release. Not sure if Pebble Time makes this obsolete but I figured I'd put it up!

data.description: A watchface with time as text + weather conditions. Be sure to click on the gear icon to see all of the features available!

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a bug that prevented the previously set temperature display (Kelvin or Fahrenheit) from being restored unless the user clicked save in the config window.

data.title: Digitus
